inn1.comm: starts off with a good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of swing and  Masakadza leaves it through to the keeper
closer to the off stump line and  Masakadza is made to defend
on the middle and off stump line, defended stretching well forward and the ball rolls down to silly mid-on
beaten! good length delivery, in the channel outside the off stump and shaping away a touch.  Masakadza is sucked forward into the defensive prod and the ball zips past the outside edge. Well bowled
forced away towards point, Ashraful moves across quickly and cuts off the single
slightly short and coming in with the angle,  Masakadza gets forward and taps it away on the leg side. Nazmul starts off with a maiden.
flat delivery on the middle and off stump line, defended back down the track.
bowled from round the stumps, good length and coming in with the angle - Vermeulen pushes forward and taps it away into the gap between point and cover. Quick single and they are off.
bit wide outside the off stump, edged past the diving slip fielder

drifitng down the leg side, this one kept on going with the arm - Masakadza looks to work it away on the leg side but fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad. Half a shout for lbw turned down - was missing leg by a long way
left alone outside the off stump
defended down on the off side, Razzak too starts off with a decent over
short of a good length delivery, pitched close to the off stump line and coming in with the angle - Vermeulen gets right behind the line and defends it with a straight bat.
bit wide outside the off stump, just enough to make Vermeulen push at it and the ball goes past the outside edge.
Inside edge onto the pad and the appeal is turned down. Pretty close if not for the wood.
Once again Nazmul is right on the money - Vermeulen defends it back to the bowler
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, driven straight to the fielder at cover
short of a good length delivery and drifting on to middle and leg, Vermeulen looks to turn it away on the leg side but fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad.
Masakadza comes down the track and lofts one over the mid-on fielder, that should break the shackles. Got to the pitch of the ball nicely and just hit through the line
cut away square on the off side
quicker delivery and driven straight to the fielder at cover
tossed up outside the off stump, defended stretching well forward
the one that slides on with the arm, defended watchfully
defended back to the bowler
comes forward and defends
outside the off stump. Vermuelen comes forward and drives it to point where a misfield allows him a couple
fuller outside the off stump. Vermeulen stays rooted to the crease and defends
outside the off stump. Vermeulen looks to drive it away and is beaten
outside the off stump. Vermeulen moves across and drives it to cover but unconvincingly
on the middle and leg as Vermeulen moves across and turns it away to fine-leg for a boundary
outside the off stump. Masakadza drives it to mid-off
on the leg stump. Masakadza sweeps it away to fine-leg for a single

that's dropped! Razzak induces the edge from Vermeulen, who has outstretched his bat out in defense. Rahim can't grab a straight-forward chance and Razzak can only sink his head into his hands in despair

and the drop off the previous ball does not count for much as Vermeulen looks to run the ball down to third man but only succeeds in edging it to first slip. It takes a diving effort from Junaid to hold onto the catch. Good catch that! Predictably the happiest man around is Rahim
bowls an arm-ball to the new batsman, Taylor who does well to come down the track and defend it to mid-off
and that's a quicker one to end the over with as Taylor lets it pass to the keeper
fuller on the off and middle. Masakadza comes forward and closes the face of the bat as he pushes it to the leg side
fuller on the middle and leg. Masakadza whips it away to fine-leg for a single and gets off the strike
gets to swing it in from outside the off stump. He pitches it short which makes Taylor's job easier in letting it pass to the keeper
outside the off stump and coming in. Pitches it on a shorter length once again as Taylor gets behind the line of the delivery and pushes it to point
pitches it on a good length outside the off stump and gets it to swing into the batsman. Taylor gets right behind the line of the delivery and defends it to the off side
Taylor is pretty circumspect to say the least as he gets onto the back foot to defend a fuller delivery to cover
and goes with the angle of the bowling arm and a bowls one down the leg side

and now that's a gift hand-packed by Razzak as he pitches one short and wide outside the off stump. Masakadza picks the length early and is waiting on the back foot as he cuts it past the fielder at point for a boundary

and "Junaid-man" is in action again as Razzak bowls one spinning away from the batsman. Masakadza is deceived in the flight as he comes down the track but decides to go through with the drive on the leg side. All he manages to get is an edge that flies fast to first slip where Junaid leaps across to his right and snips it mid-air. What a catch! and he has two of them to show off now
fuller on the middle stump. Chigumbara gives it the full respect as he comes onto the front foot and defends it back to the bowler
goes short once again as Chigumbara forces it to sweeper cover for a couple and gets off the mark

short of a good length delivery and Chigumbara is exceptional in picking the delivery as he punches it off the back foot through extra cover for a boundary. Chigumbara is off to an exceptional start now and Zimbabwe would want him to continue that
over compensates by pitching it on the leg stump. Chigumbara goes down on one knee and powerfully sweeps it past fine-leg for a boundary
... and Taylor is still circumspect as he gets onto the back foot and pushes it back onto the pitch
on the middle and leg. Taylor gets onto the front foot and closes the face of the bat as he pushes it to the leg side
and Taylor ensures that he does not get third duck for the series. He gets onto the back foot and turns away a short delivery to deep square-leg for a single

Nazmul seems to have found the right length to curtail the free scoring methods of the batsmen. He bowls one short on the middle and leg. Chigumbara gets onto the back foot and defends it on the leg side
outside the off stump and on a good length. Chigumbara initially thinks of letting the delivery pass but at the last moment decides to play it defensively to off-side
a classical defensive stroke to end the over with as Chigumbara comes forward and presses the ball back onto the pitch
good length delivery outside the off stump. Taylor is quick to get onto the back foot and defend it to short cover

short outside the off stump. Taylor does not need any more invitation to unfurl the cut shot as he breaks the self-imposed shackles. Razzak is bowling pretty poorly compared to the lofty standards he has set in series
and now that's a quick and a risky single. Taylor pushes a delivery on the middle stump to cover and sets off for a quick single. The fielder's throw is late in reaching Razzak as Taylor runs across
outside the leg stump. Chigumbara thrusts his pad and forward and allows the ball to rap his pads. There is a muted appeal from the keeper
outside the off stump. Chigumbara picks the line early but not the length as he looks to drive it away. The lack of bounce beats him
arm-ball from outside the off stump. Chigumbara picks it and makes room for himself as he drives it away to mid-off
outside the off stump and coming into the batsman. Taylor gets behind the line of the delivery and defends it back onto the pitch
fuller on the off and middle. Taylor moves across and onto his front foot as he punches a drive to mid-off
a fuller length delivery on the off stump again. There is a distinct change in Taylor's approach now as he comes onto the front foot to defend it
short outside the off stump. Taylor cuts it to third-man for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Chigumbara comes onto the front foot and drives it straight to the fielder placed at short cover
good length delivery outside the off stump. Chigumbara comes onto the front foot and punches it to point
on the middle stump. Taylor comes down the track and looks to loft it away but gets an inside edge to fine-leg for a single
arm-ball on the off and middle. Chigumbara comes forward and thrusts his front-foot out. It would have been going down the leg side
arm-ball speared into the middle stump. Chigumbara makes room and pushes it to mid-on for a quick single
outside the off stump and a touch fuller in length as Taylor comes forward and pushes it to point
arm-ball into the middle and leg. Taylor gets onto the back foot and turns it away to fine-leg for a single
outside the off stump and turning away from the batsman. Chigumbara looks to defend it but withdraws at the last moment noticing the flight on the delivery
outside the off stump and coming into the batsman. Taylor does well to play the ball late and cut it to third man for a single
short on the off and middle. Chigumbara picks it and is quick to get onto the back foot. He pulls it over the infield comfortably and gets a boundary for his efforts
good length delivery outside the off stump. Chigumbara comes forward and defends it to the off-side. Chigumbara is playing it sensibly now
a bouncer on the off and middle. Chigumbara again comfortably picks it and ducks under it
fuller outside the off stump. Chigumbara comes onto the front foot and drives it to mid-off. He does not get any run for that
good length delivery moving away from the batsman. Chigumbara opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man for a single
outside the off stump and moving away from him. Chigumbara is playing for the angled delivery as he looks to defend it and is beaten
now the angled delivery comes and Chigumbara picks this comfortably and defends it back onto the pitch
and again the angled delivery as Chigumbara looks to defend it on the off side and gets an inside edge to short fine-leg
fuller length delivery on the middle and leg as Chigumbara comes forward and defends it to cover
on the leg stump and fuller in length. Chigumbara reads the flight well as he comes forward and murders it. The ball has four written all over it as it heads to long-on boundary

bowls with the angle once again as he looks to push it into the off side and the spin beats him. He is rapped on the pads. Keeper and the bowler go up in unison but the ball would have been going down the leg side
on the off stump and fuller in length. Taylor looks to loft it away and is beaten by the turn
outside the off stump. Taylor comes forward and pushes it to the off side and runs across for a quick single
on the leg stump. Chigumbara turns it away to short fine-leg and is pretty slow in responding to Taylor's call. Sloppy fielding by the fielder at short fine-leg allows him a single
fuller length delivery on the middle and leg. Taylor comes forward and pushes it to mid-off
and the traditional spinner away from the batsman who looks to defend it but is beaten by the pace and just about manages to get bat on it
on the middle and leg. Fuller in length as Taylor comfortably turns it away to deep midwicket for a single
on the leg stump. Taylor looks to defend it and gets an inside edge to short fine-leg for a single
on the middle and leg. Chigumbara plays it against the turn and lofts it wide of the long-on fielder for a boundary
bowls it with the angle on the leg stump. Chigumbara comes forward and defends it
on the middle stump. Chigumbara comes forward and defends it onto the pitch
arm-ball on the leg stump. Chigumbara absolutely murders it as he lofts it to deep midwicket for a boundary. He is looking to be in superb touch today is Chigumbara
outside the off stump and a flighted delivery. Chigumbara comes forward and looks to drive it away. He gets an outside edge which drops clear of any fielder but it could have been dangerous
outside the off stump. Taylor comes forward and drives it to long-off for a single
outside the off stump. Chigumbara comes forward and drives it to sweeper. A delay in throwing by the fielder allows them an extra run
pushes it to the leg side for a single
on the middle stump. Taylor comes forward and presses it back onto the pitch
on the leg stump and Taylor looks to sweep it away. He gets a bottom edge to short fine-leg and runs across for a single
short outside the off stump. Chigumbara cuts it away to deep point for a couple
pushed to covers
fuller on the off stump slogged away to deep midwicket
outside the off stump. Taylor comes forward and pushes it to cover
angled and going down the leg side
pushed to covers
driven down to mid-off
fuller and on the pads, turned away straight to the fielder at midwicket
turned away behind square on the leg side, keeper moves across and cuts off the single
pushed to midwicket
played wide of the fielder at midwicket, quick single taken
driven away to covers, horrible throw to the keeper gives away 2 runs
swept away to fine leg for a brace
driven off the front-foot to silly mid-on, diving stop there saves runs
punched down to long-on for an easy single, watchfully played
quicker delivery outside the off stump, Chigumbara had no option but to play at it and he ends up with a thin edge. Rahim makes no mistake behind the stumps. Zimbabwe 3 down
tossed up close to the off stump line, Waller gets a good stride in and defends it back to the bowler
bowled'm! another quicker delivery and Waller is bit late on it, ball goes past the outside edge and crashes into middle and off. Two wickets in three balls for Mahmudullah
defended back down the track
forced away towards cover
fuller and on the middle and off stump line, defended straight back to the bowl
on middle and leg, turned away behind square on the leg side, bit of edge involved there
played away on the off side
on middle and leg, worked away towards short midwicket
drifting on to the pads, Taylor looks to sweep but fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad
tight line and length, defended back to the bowler
twayward delivery down the leg side
turned away on the leg side
outside the off stump, Matsikenyeri moves across a bit and plays it down to long-on
bit more air, Taylor gets well forward and plays it down
pitched up on the stumps, Matsikenyeri gets forward to the pitch of the delivery and drives it past the fielder at mid-on, excellent timing and placement.
worked away on the leg side for an easy single
defended back to the bowler
worked away square on the leg side, misfield allows the batsmen to cross over comfortably
played away towards point, no room for a single there
short outside the off stump, driven off the back-foot to the point region
drifting down the leg side, Taylor goes low and paddles it down to the fine leg region, runs hard and comfortably comes back for the second
played away on the leg side
swpet away straight to the fielder at square leg
swept away nicely to deep backward square leg, diving stop in the deep cuts off the boundary
and Taylor sweeps again, this time gets it past the fielder at square leg
outside the off stump, flighted delivery, Matsikenyeri pushes forward to defend and ends up with an inside edge to square leg
on the pads, Taylor gets forward and nudges it past the fielder at square leg
looks to force it away on the leg side but makes no contact
turned away with soft hands to the square leg region, quick single taken
on middle and leg, tucked away towards short fine leg for a single
worked away through square leg
on middle and leg, with the fine leg inside the circle Taylor sweeps it past the fielder, excellent placement

stumped! drifting down the leg side, Matsikenyeri comes down the track and gets beaten by a long way, Rahim moves across to his left, collects the ball cleanly and quickly clips the bails and Matsikenyeri is just short. Bangladesh 5 down
drifting down leg and Mutizwa gets hit on the pad, loud appeal for lbw turned down
driven away to deep cover, gets it well wide of the fielder in the deep
on middle and off, Mutizwa looks to turn it away behind square but fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad.
worked away straight to the fielder at short midwicket
coming in with the angle from wide outside the off stump, Mutizwa gets a good stride in and defends it with a straight bat
worked away behind square on the leg side
look to sweep but the shot is not timed well enough and the ball rolls away off the bottom edge
coming in with the angle, defended watchfully.
Swept away nicely through square leg, there is protection in the deep
worked away off the front-foot and well wide of the fielder at midwicket
looks to play it down on the leg side, ball clips the inside edge and rolls away towards midwicket
goes for the slog sweep, ball clips the top edge and balloons up over the keeper.
full and close to the off stump line, Taylor gets well forward and turns it away well wide of the fielder at midwicket
sharp turn, pitched well outside the off stump and coming in, Mutizwa defends off the front-foot
comes down the track and looks to loft it away but ends up with a thick inside edge to deep midwicket
well outside the off stump and turning in, Taylor moves across and pushes it back to the bowler
on middle and leg, Taylor tamely turns it away towards midwicket
tossed up on the stump, Mutizwa looks to work it away on the leg side but ends up with a leading edge back to the bowler. 4 more to go.

Two wickets in three balls -  second time this has happened today! Shakib fires it outside the off stump, Chibhabha pushes forward to defend and the edge is taken. Junaid at first slip dives low to his left and takes a super catch - Chibhabha departs for a duck
defended outside the off stump
full and on the pads, swept away nicely to the fine leg fence - good clean hit
turned away behind square on the leg side
pushed down the track to silly mid-off, bowlers moves across and picks it up
width offered outside the off stump, cut away behind point for a brace
pitched up outside the off stump, Taylor gets to the pitch of the delivery and drives it down to long-off for a single
quicker delivery outside the off stump, Cremer gets his left leg across, covers the stumps and leaves it through to the keeper
wide delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
driven off the front-foot, straight to the fielder at mid-off
driven wide of the fielder at mid-off
edged away behind the stumps
left alone outside the off stump
quicker delivery, pushed back to the bowler
turned away with the spin to the square leg region
short delivery outside the off stump, Taylor cuts it away through deep point
pushes it back onto the pitch
and that's a half-century to Taylor as he pushes one to mid-off
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
outside the off stump and left alone
pushes it to point
swept to fine-leg for a single
beaten outside the off stump
quicker delivery outside the off stump, defended down, end of a successful over
clipped away through the gap between mid-on and midwicket
defended outside the off stump
on the middle and off stump line, Price gets well forward and presents the full face of the bat.
pushed away towards cover, no room for a single there
on the stumps, defended stretching well forward
pitched outside the off stump and this one turns away from the right-hander, Price has a poke at it and the ball goes past the outside edge
good length delivery, close to the off stump line, Taylor stretches well forward and defends it with a straight bat
played away on the leg side, bowler runs across and cuts off the single
driven off the front-foot to long-off for a single.
defended outside the off stump, ball rolls away towards cover
tossed up outside the off stump, defended stretching well forward - End of a fine spell from the captain
take that! comes down the track, nicely gets to the pitch of the delivery and lofts it straight back over the bowler's head for a super six.
even better! Once again Taylor comes down the track, this time gets to the pitch and slogs it away well over the midwicket fence.
swept away to fine leg, there is protection in the deep so just a single
comes forward and defends it down on the leg side
worked away just wide of the fielder at short fine leg, quick single taken
turned away towards the vacant square leg region, easy single to end the over
turned away off the pads to deep midwicket, easy single
turned away straight to the fielder at short fine leg. Price is watchful here.
on the middle and off stump line, defended with a straight bat and the ball rolls back to the bowler
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, once again price gets well forward and defends it back to the bowler
turned away well wide of the fielder at square leg
good length delivery outside the off stump, Price leaves it through to the keeper
short of a good length delivery, Price gets forward and drops it on the off side, Taylor calls early and they scamper through for a single, excellent running between the wickets
good length delivery, Taylor runs it down to third man for an easy single

shot! short ball on the middle and off stump line, Price picks it up early - gets right on top of the bounce and pulls it away to the midwicket fence. Nicely rolled his wrists to keep the ball down and the placement was spot on
another shot ball and Price once again goes for the pull but fails to make contact
good length delivery outside the off stump, Price pushes forward and defends it with a straight bat
hit on the pad, appeal turned down
worked away on the leg side, keeper moves across and cuts it off
driven back to the bowler
worked away through midwicket
short delivery outside the off stump, Price leans back and hammers it through covers
quicker and fuller, Taylor pushes forward and taps it into the gap between point and cover, well played
full and on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
drifting down the leg side, Taylor sweeps and the ball rolls away off the glove to short fine leg
punched away to deep midwicket
worked away well wide of the fielder at short fine leg, easy single
pitched outside the off stump and turning in, Price goes right back and punches it down to long-on for a single, presented the full face of the bat there
again played down the ground to long-on, single will keep Taylor on strike
played off the back-foot to wide long-on
defended outside the off stump
punched off the back-foot to deep cover
pushed away towards point, no room for a single
driven down to long-on
on the middle and off stump line, defended stretching well forward.
on the middle and off stump line, Taylor gets forward and turns it away through midwicket, runs hard and comes back comfortably for the second. He moves to 90
defended stretching well forward
turned away off the back-foot to deep midwicket
width offered outside the off stump, Price cuts hard but fails to make contact - missed out there on some easy runs
fuller length delivery on middle and leg stump line, Price stays back and works it away through midwicket
wayward delivery down the leg side and Rahim had no chance of cutting it off
short and wide outside the off stump, Taylor moves back and across and cuts it away through point. Excellent shot and with that he moves to 95.
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Price gets forward and drives it down through extra cover
short delivery on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
clipped away to deep midwicket, fumble in the deep allows the batsmen to come back for the second
again worked away through midwicket, takes the first run quickly and they come back for the second. He moves to 99, which is his highest score in ODIs - Just one more needed to get to three figures
defended watchfully
drifting down the leg side, Taylor misses out there and the ball rolls away off the pad

gone! 9 down with Taylor on 99! slightly short and on the stumps, the ball just skidded through after hitting the deck, Price leans back to pull and is beaten all ends up. Loud appeal and up goes the finger
drifting down leg, appeal turned down
down the leg side, 200 comes up for Zimbabwe
defended stretching well forward
quicker delivery down the leg side, Mpofu pushes forward to defend and gets hit on the pad
another one down the leg side
wide outside the off stump, Mpofu goes after it and gets beaten - Taylor has a word with him
defended down, Mpofu survives
fulltoss, driven straight back to the bowler, missed out there
good length delivery, close to the off stump line - Taylor gets well forward, goes low and defends it with a straight bat
fuller length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Taylor drops it down on the off side but the bowler follows it up and cuts off the single
pitched up outside the off stump, Taylor drives it down to mid-off. Four dot balls in a row
ton! pushed away towards point and they scamper through for a dangerous single, throw at the striker's end misses the target and Mpofu makes it across safely. Direct hit and he was a goner!
outside the off stump, defended
way down the leg side
in the slot and Taylor sweeps it away through the gap between midwicket and square leg - excellent slot sweep
pitched up outside the off stump, Taylor winds up and hammers it over the long-off fence. Clean hit
swept away to fine leg, excellent diving stop in the deep from Ashraful cuts off the boundary
comes down the track and lifts it away to the deep midwicket fence - he is on a roll here.
played away to deep backward square leg - runs hard and makes it across safely for the second
wide outside the off stump, Taylor looks to tap it away fine but fails to make contact. So 19 taken off the last over and Zimbabwe finish on 221.

inn2.comm: starts with a wide down the leg side
Back of a length ball, defended off the backfoot towards cover
on middle and leg, defended towards midwicket this time
first runs off the bat as he swings the ball off his pad towards square leg
full and outside off, punched back towards the bowler off the front foot
again it's pushed back towards the bowler
a hat-trick of forward defensives back to the bowler to end the over
Carves it towards cover
Defended towards cover this time
Ashraful steps down the track and looks to lofts that over mid-on, mishits it, was nearly out but it landed wide of Mpofu
Comes down the track, checks his shot, plays it late with a flat bat towards third man
Down the leg side, flicks the pads and runs down to fine leg
Defended cautiously off the backfoot
defends the first ball of the over
this one shapes to swing in but holds its line and Junaid is beaten

is that the end of Ashraful, Junaid dropped the ball to the off side and set off for the run, Matsikenyeri is onto it in a flash, throws down the stumps at the keeper's end, third umpire sends Ashraful on his way
beaten first up, by a superb delivery just outside off
defended to the leg side, 'No, no' is the loud call as Matsikenyeri fields again
well outside off stump, Raqibul is content to leave that one for the keeper
rocks back to give himself room and slashes that behind point for four
gets well forward and defends back to the bowler
and again, big stride in as he blocks it
takes a couple of paces to get to the pitch of the ball, tap it wide of mid-on for a single
arm ball from round the wicket, gets forward and defends
a bit of turn, thick outside edge sends the ball scurrying towards backward point
gets a healthy outside edge, it lands just short of Price at first slip, is he standing too deep?
this time off the outside half of the bat, the ball dribbles towards point
struck on the pads, big appeal for lbw, but that was whistling down leg
on the hips, poor line that, Junaid helps it along over square leg for four
this was a back of a length on middle and off, Junaid gets forward and jans that wide of mid-on
doesn't quite time the off drive as the bowler serves up a half-volley
gets on the front foot and eases it down to long-on
full delivery on off, driven to mid-on for another single
offstump ball, defended off the backfoot towards point
carved towards cover this time, straight at the fielder
overpitched outside off, gets forward and wrists it towards short midwicket, again the palcement isn't great
shorter this time, gets behind the line of the balland defends
ooh, that was close, Mpofu has consistently got the ball to moves away a hint after pitching back of a length, Raqibul pokes tentatively at it and is beaten
well outside off this time, pitched up but Raqibul stays on the backfoot, and pushes at it away from his body, gets enough bat on it to help it towards cover point
gets the outside edge this time, it lands short of Cremer at backward point

fortunate four for Raqibul, who is looking very scratchy at the moment, he was looking to leave that one outside off, but lifted his bat so late that the ball thuds into the lower part of the bat and flies past the keeper to the third man boundary
much better from Raqibul, though he gets no runs for a solid defense
Mpofu has done everything but get a wicket here, again he manages to tempt Raqibul into flirting at a delivery just outside off, Raqibul is beaten again
poked towards backward point, straight at the fielder so there's no single to be taken
poor line that, on the pads, Junaid swivels and pulls that one to deep backward square leg for a single
stands tall and punches an outside off ball towards short cover
crisply punched by Raqibul, wide of mid-off, Masakadza moves across quickly to his left and dives to cut it off
an elegant square drive from Junaid, gets nicely forward and crashes that past point for four, a touch uppish but no fielder had a chance of catching that
crunched towards point again, straight towards the fielder
back of a length on offstump, defended off the backfoot towards the offstump
same length, just outside off, Raqibul gets well forward and defends towards mid-off
swing and a miss outside off, no footwork from Raqibul there, lucky to not get an edge
a touch shorter, a bit wide, crashed towards deep backward point
lofts it towards long-on for a single, not in control of that shot
goes for the flashy cover drive, gets an inside edge onto his pads
shortish ball on off, defended towards point
length ball on off, defended to the off side
on the pads, easy picking for Raqibul, tickles it down to fine leg for a single
oversteps, free-hit coming up
good delivery that, Junaid was charging down the track, it was a slow bouncer directed at the batsman, who ducks to get out of the way
directed into the rib cage, Raqibul defends
fuller delivery, on middle and leg, punched to mid-on, too firmly to have time for a single
short of length this time, outside off, pushed to mid-off this time, another dot ball
similar length, slightly wide outside off, Raqibul tries a cute dab to third man but doesn't connect with the ball
short ball from Mpofu, clipped towards the square leg umpire
Mpofu finally gets his first wicket after a good spell of bowling, it wasn't a particularly good delivery, short and wide, Junaid guides it along to third man where Malcolm Waller is waiting
cuts him in half with a back of a length delivery outside off
turns this one towards midwicket
short ball on legstump, swung towards square leg for a single
defended with soft hands towards the off side
nice juciy half-volley, just outside off, punched firmly past mid-off, Masakadza chases after it and dives to cut it off just within the boundary
he's in great touch, short and wide, Shakib says 'Thank you very much' and cracks it past cover for four
length ball outside off, driven nicely off the front foot towards mid-off
this time Raqibul blocks towards cover
short and wide, Raqibul chases after it and misses
good shot except for the placement, firmly driven towards cover where the fielder dives to cut it off
it's not Mpofu's day, first slip was pretty wide, the outside edge flies between slip and the keeper for four
length ball, angling into off, driven off the front foot towards mid-off
Raqibul looks to drive that towards the off, gets an inside edge towards midwicket
on middle and leg, Shakib shuffles across and defends to the leg side
overpitched delivery, just outside off, Shakib looks to muscle it past mid-on, can't get the timing right
angling into offstump, Shakib stays on the backfoot and defends towards the bowler
looks for a flamboyant hook, it was a slow bouncer, Shakib can't get bat on ball
short and wide, crunched past point for two
back of a length ball, on offstump, punched to the off side
short and wide, slapped towards cover, straight towards the fielder
played with soft hands towards backward point, where Vermeulen misfields to give away a single
Shakib is in prime form, there was a man at the deep midwicket boundary, Shakib doesn't care, he swings a legstump ball to the boundary, one-bounce four
sensibly knocks it for a single after getting the boundary
shortish ball outside off, played with soft hands behind backward point for a single
ends the over with a dot ball, on middle and leg, blocked back to the bowler, that's the end of the Powerplays
the third-man region continues to be profitable for Raqibul, he glides a wide ball for a single
stands tall and punches it back to the bowler
full and wide, flailed towards sweeper cover, who has to race across to his left to field
third umpire is called for, Raqibul should be safe though, he has raced dow2n after Shakib tapped it towards point, a direct hit at the non-striker's end but the batsman is safe
defended watchfully off the front foot
a flighted delivery lures Raqibul out of the crease, he misses the ball and his struggle at the crease is over as Taylor whips off the bails
nicely tossed up again, fullish ball, blocked back to the bowler
short ball from Cremer, Mushfiqur gets his front foot out of the way and swipes that over the midwicket rope
Mushfiqur is in an aggressive mood here, a slightly full ball is powered over mid-on for four
shortish ball, chopped towards sweeper cover
length ball on off, defended off the back foot towards cover
a touch short again, just a bit of width, dabbed towards third man
a bit of width again, cracked towards deep point
in the channel outside off, steered to third man for a single
length  ball outside off, punched towards mid-off
gets nicely forward and eases the ball to long-off for an easy single
superb placement from Mushfiqur, carves that one off the backfoot between gully and backward point for four
flat delivery outside the off stump, defended stretching well forward. Presented the full face of the bat
Full and on the middle and off stump line, Rahim pushes forward to defend and gets hit on the pad, half an appeal for lbw turned down.
worked away off the back-foot and well in front of sqaure leg, easy single to end the over.
pitched up and drifting on to the pads, worked away just wide of the fielder at midwicket for a single.
full and close to the off stump line, driven on the up, timed well but the ball went straight to the fielder at mid-on.

short delivery outside the off stump, enough width offered and Rahim nicely cuts it away through the gap between point and fully. It was not a big gap between those two fielders and Rahim was spot-on with the placement
drifting down the leg side and that's nicely turned away to deep fine leg, Waller in the deep runs across quickly to his left, dives full length and cuts off a certain boundary.
played away on the leg side, no room for a single there.
short of a good length delivery, turned away straight to the fielder at midwicket
played away on the off side
quicker delivery, Shakib plays off the back-foot and ends up with an inside edge on to the pad - close call.
played back to the bowler
flat delivery on the middle and off stump line, Rahim gets forward and drives it down to long-off for an easy single. 100 comes up for Bangladesh.
tight delivery, defended down on the leg side
fuller delivery, Shakib goes for the sweep but fails to connect, pitched outside leg so not much of an appeal
short and wide outside the off stump, Rahim moves back and across and cuts it away to deep third man.
Cremer takes the catch at backward square leg, it was a short ball, Mushfiqur goes for the sweep, top-edges it
wide delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
tossed up and turning in sharply, Mahmudullah looks to defend but fails to make contact and the ball crashes into the pad, probably bit of an inside edge there.
short and wide outside the off stump, cut away behind square on the off side.
pitched up on the middle and off stump line, dirven away towards cover and a diving stop there saves few runs.
defended outside the off stump, ball rolls away towards point - fielder moves in quickly and cuts off the single.
excellent delivery, this one gripped the surface and turned sharply, ball clips the left thigh and goes straight to the slip fielder, loud appeal for lbw turned down.
pushed away towards cover
googly - worked away off the back-foot to the square leg reigon.
pitched up on the pads, Shakib makes room and drives it down to long-on for a single
on the middle and off stump line, turning away. Mahmudullah gets forward and defends it with a straight bat.Well played in the end.

that's could be the big one, he misses the ball as he goes for the powerful shot, he misses the ball, the keeper takes off the bails, is Shakib's foot in the air at that moment? A big cheer tells you he's safe, that decision took about 10 replays to resolve
punched off the front foot to short cover

Matsikenyeri has done it, superb delivery, Shakib is going down the track looking to smash the ball out of the ground, he doesn't connect as the ball spins away sharply, Taylor has ages to whip off the bails, no need for a third umpire this time
on offstump, clipped towards square leg to get off the mark
fired down the leg side, flicks the pads and dribbles to short fine leg
outside the off, defended by Naeem to the off side
fullish ball on off, blocked off the front foot
slightly shorter, on off again, punched back to the bowler
on the pads this time, clipped towards midwicket
full ball on middle and leg, defended off the front foot
that's a maiden, pushed back to the bowler
fired down the leg side
turned towards square leg
clipped to square leg for a single again
turned to midwicket for another comfortable single
fullish ball, drilled down to long-on, the batsman stroll through for a single
Naeem goes for an inside-out lofted drive because mid-off is in the circle, mishits it over the bowler's head, lands safely though and thats two runs
on middle and leg, defended to the leg side
Price keeps things tight, pushed back to the bowler
another dot ball, blocked to the leg side
pushed to short cover to Masakadza
'Down,' shouts Taylor to the bowler, Price dives to his right to cut off the straight drive
another maiden as Price fields the ball again
short ball, sits up, Naeem toe ends it towards deep midwicket
another short ball, Cremer needs to get his length right, this one is powered past short cover, sweeper cover has no chance
much better, on offstump, good length, defended to the off side
blocked back to the bowler
flighted delivery, pitching on middle, driven to short cover
wrong Ãºn from Cremer, pushed back to the bowler
punched off the backfoot towards long-on for a single
quicker ball outside off, looks to drive off the backfoot but he misses
comes down the track and pushes it to the left of the bowler who fields
'No run,' says Taylor as the batsman defends towards point
a quick single is pinched after driving the ball past short cover
on middle and leg, tucked towards square leg off the backfoot
defended down on the leg side
gets forward and forces it away into the gap between point and cover, quick single added to the total.
pitched on leg and turning across, defended on the front-foot
worked away towards midwicket
quicker delivery outside the off stump, this one just skidded accross, Mahmudullah looks to tap it away but fails to make contact
driven off the back-foot to long-off for a single
bit wide outside the off stump, bowled from round the stumps - Mahmudullah leans back and punches it down to long-off.
forced away on the off side, no room for a single there
defended outside the off stump
full and on the stumps, bit of air - driven inside out to the point region
gets behind the line and drives it straight back to the bowler
drifting down the leg side, Mahmudullah looks to sweep it away fine but fails to make contact
straight delivery, defended stretching well forward
on the leg stump. Mahmudullah looks to sweep it away and gets rapped on the pads. He runs three and they are signalled as leg-byes
outside the off stump. Naeem comes forward and pushes it to cover for a single
on the leg stump. Mahmudullah turns it away to short fine-leg for a single
outside the off stump and Naeem comes forward to punch it to cover
outside the off stump and left alone
on the leg stump. Naeem turns it away to fine-leg for a single
fuller on the off stump. Naeem turns it to midwicket for a single
on the leg stump. Mahmudullah sweeps it to deep square-leg for a couple
outside the off stump and left alone by Mahmudullah
on the middle stump. Mahmudullah turns it away to deep midwicket for a single
on the middle stump. Naeem pushes it back to the bowler
on the leg stump. Naeem turns it to fine-leg for a single
outside off, poked behind point for a single
slashed off the backfoot towards cover
paddle-swept towards short fine leg
length ball, goes for the lofted off drive, outside edge takes it towards backward point
good ball that, drifts onto leg and then spins back towards middle
overpitched on off, eased to long-off for a single
chopped towards cover point for a single
sharp turn after the ball pitches well outside off, plays it late and gets it past backward point
on middle and leg, driven towards short midwicket, not collected cleanly and gives away a single, the throw towards the keeper catches Naeem on his back
another easy single, rocks back and slaps that to sweeper cover
punched to short midwicket, straight at the fielder
on the pads, clipped behind square leg, batsmen attempt a quick single, direct hit from Masakadza would have made things interesting
crunched past point, the fielder there gets a hand on it to take the pace off the ball, so it's only a single
gets well forward and drives it to short cover
shortish ball on middle, lifts his front foot as he swipes that to midwicket, another misfield gives away a single
superb shot, sashays down the track, gets almost to the pitch and thrashes that over extra cover for six
the crowd is on it's feet as Bangladesh get four more, opens the face and guides it past the keeper for four
length ball on off, turned to short midwicket, no run this time
very short, the batsman rocks back and smashes it, but straight at cover
drifts onto the pads, clipped towards square leg for a single
tossed up this time, punched to midwicket

is that a run-out? The Zimbabweans are confident, the batsman was well short at the non-striker's end when the stumps were broken, but did the bowler's hands disturb the stumps before that? it was turned to backward square leg, the batsmen looked to pinch a tight single, the replays showed that it was the ball that hit the stumps, Mahmudullah was well short, he's on his way, is there a twist in this game?
wide down the leg side
lovely shot that, bends his knee and creams that over extra cover, that was wide outside off, the ball rockets ot the boundary
appeal for lbw, that was sliding down the leg side
outside off, left alone
Chibhabha has struck, a pretty poor delivery, angling down leg, Razzak helps it along to the keeper Mutizwa, who's standing in for Taylor, who has gone off the field
back of length ball on offstump, defended to the leg side
shuffles across and works a length ball on offstump towards midwicket
terrific delivery that, back of length, in the channel outside off, the batsman is sucked into playing at that, he misses

yes he can, that's a double-wicket maiden, fantastic over for Zimbabwe, Enamul was a bit unlucky as that hit him above the knee-roll in front of middle and leg, might have been worth giving him the benefit of doubt there, the umpire has raised his finger though
another dot ball as the batsman looks to defend
pushed towards short cover for a quick single
Tamim gets off the mark by clipping the ball behind square
precious dot ball there, the ball spins sharply away from the batsman, who can't get bat on it
drifting onto the pads, tucked behind square leg for an easy single
on the leg side again, swept to short fine leg, straight towards the fielder
Mpofu starts with a poor delivery, well down the leg side
short and wide, easy for Naeem, stands tall and crashes it behind backward point for four, lovely shot under pressure
Mpofu bowls a much better ball, on a length, homing into offstump, blocked to the off side
a touch shorter, the batsman jumps down the track and pushes the ball to mid-on
full and a touch of swing into the batsman, who drives it firmly back to the bowler

yorker from Mpofu, superb delivery that,  Naeem just about squeezed it out towards the keeper, the batsmen went through for the single, Tamim seemed to have got in the bowler's way, he caught short by the keeper's throw, he stands his ground protesting that the bowler blocked him, the umpire sends him on his way, massive blow for Bangladesh
big appeal for lbw, another full delivery, striking the pads, but that was going down leg
on the pads, defended towards midwicket
paddle swept towards short fine leg, declines the single
full ball down the leg side, Naeem comes down the track gives himself room and lashes that over wide long-on
swept to short fine leg again, single not taken
massive appeal for caught-behind down the leg side, they were convinced he's out but the umpire signals wide
another single turned down after Naeem defends the ball towards short cover
Naeem keeps the strike by just dropping the ball towards point with soft hands, the batsmen zip through for a tight single, superb batting from Naeem
in the blockhole, on middle and leg, punched to mid-on, single isn't taken again
muscles it to the leg side, midwicket misfields, Bangladesh wanted two but Cremer comes in from long-on to keep them to one
short of length, defended back towards the bowler off the backfoot
fullish ball outside off, gets a bit of an inside edge towards square leg to get off the strike
full ball outside off, drilled along the ground to long-off for a single
length ball on off, shows the full face of the bat to block the ball back to the bowler
powers it to long-on, easy single for the taking, doesn't take it
Naeem dances down the track and launches that on over long-on for a six to bring up his half-century, that was a length ball
wow, what a shot that is, another length ball, Naeem gets under it and whacks it over the bowler's head for another six
A hat-trick of sixes, Naeem Islam is going berserk here, Chibhabha not learning his lessons, offers a length ball again, Naeem smashes it over wide long-on for another six
well outside off, Naeem looks to make it four in a row, but that was too wide to swipe to the leg side
gets the single to keep the strike, Naeem was looking to whip that to the leg side, gets it away to mid-off
in the blockhole, on off and middle, dug out to the leg side, good delivery that
slightly shorter, Naeem drives it elegantly towards extra cover, another single turned down
score are level, not the most convincing of strokes from Naeem, it was a ytorker length ball just outside off, gets a thick outside edge past the keeper for four
Mpofu surprises him with bouncer, Naeem spots it early and ducks under
another short ball, this outside off, Naeem calmly gets under that one as well

Naeem has done it, sensational victory for Bangladesh, what a mature innings this is from Naeem, it would have all ended in tears though if the fielder at extra cover had thrown down the stumps at the non-striker's stumps when Naeem was scampering the single, the ball ricocheted off the bowler's hand to reach extra cover, the crowd is delirious and why not?
